response.overview: November 21st, 2009 :: In a hard-hitting main event, Jigsaw battles Gran Akuma. Claudio Castagnoli, Mike Quackenbush, and Jorge “Skayde” Rivera (the Wrestle Factory trainers for 2009) team together for the only time in history to wrestle The Order Of The Neo-Solar Temple! Tim Donst and Hydra meet in a “Loser Leaves Chikara” match that marks one competitor's farewell to the squared circle. Matches featured:  1. Hallowicked vs Ophidian  2. Golden Dream Match The UnStable & Chuck Taylor vs The Future Is Now vs Fire Ant, Arik Cannon & Hallowicked  3. Carpenter Ant vs Amasis  4. Player Dos vs Yujiro Kushida  5. Claudio Castagnoli, Mike Quackenbush & Jorge "Skayde" Rivera vs The Order of the Neo-Solar Temple  6. The Throwbacks vs F.I.S.T.  7. Loser Leaves CHIKARA: Hydra vs Tim Donst  8. The UnStable vs The Colony  9. Gran Akuma vs Jigsaw.
response.title: Chikara Throwing Life's Instructions Away
